name: Slow Access Memory
description:
A little puzzle game where you play SAM, a robot with very little memory, who must upload and download programs according to his needs ...
The game is not over, it's a nice little prototype, I hope you'll like it.
I created this game with two other people, who took care of the sound design and graphics.

To play, all you need is the left click of the mouse, the elements with which you can interact are highlighted in yellow.
